main

Class LineDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • main.LineDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LineDetector
extends java.lang.Thread
    Contains the methods responsible for fetching and processing the samples taken by the color sensor.
    Author:
    Aimee Ascencio
